forgotPasswordInstructions: Enter your email and we'll send a link to reset your password.
manageTeamsSubtitle: Teams are now managed through user registration. You can edit team names or delete teams here.
dropzoneDefault: Drag & drop a .csv file here, or click to select a file
chatbotWelcome: Hello! Ask me anything about competitive programming or this contest.
confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the contest? This will clear all submissions, tasks, and keys from the database.
confirmDeleteTeam: Are you sure you want to delete the team "{teamName}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteTask: Are you sure you want to delete task "{taskName}"? This will also remove its answer key and cannot be undone.
toastTeamUpdated: Team updated locally! API update not implemented in this version.
toastContestReset: Contest data has been completely reset.
registerSuccessMessage: Registration successful! You can now log in.
resetEmailSentMessage: Password reset link sent! Please check your email inbox (and spam folder).

error.teamNameRequired: Team name is required for contestants.
error.registrationFailed: Registration failed. An unknown error occurred.
error.emailNotFound: No user found with this email.
error.mustBeContestant: You must be a logged-in contestant to submit.
error.keyNotSet: The answer key for task {taskId} has not been set.
error.fileEmpty: Submission file is empty or invalid.
error.rowCountMismatch: Submission has {submissionRows} data rows, but answer key has {keyRows}. Row counts must match.
error.keyFileEmpty: Master answer key file is empty or invalid.
error.taskKeyFileEmpty: Task key file is empty or invalid.
error.taskKeyMalformed: Some rows in the task key file are malformed. Expected 'category_id,content,overall_band_score'.
error.getBotResponse: Sorry, I couldn't get a response. Please try again.
error.getAnalysis: Failed to generate analysis. Please try again.
error.loadScoreboard: Could not load scoreboard data from API.
error.findUserToUpdate: Could not find your record to update score.
error.findTeamToDelete: Could not find team to delete.
error.adminOnly: Only admins can perform this action.
error.fetchTasks: Failed to load tasks from the database.
error.passwordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters.
error.currentPasswordIncorrect: Your current password is not correct. Please try again.
error.passwordUpdateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again.
